name: Desenfunda
description:
1 Bullet, 1 Duel, 2 Players

You're going to seek the highest reward in the entire west. Each turn you and your opponent will fight a duel. The first to shoot wins, but be careful to shoot before the signal otherwise your bullet jams

Control: 

Player 1: Buttom A

Player 2: Buttom L

Restart Round: R

This is my first game, I really appreciate you trying it. Follow me on my Twitter to see my future projects
